title: Slap Shot 2: Breaking the Ice 2002 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
Get ready to experience moments of intense action, with onslaughts and endless laughter in this spectacular film, the continuation of Vale Tudo, the original classic, hailed as "one of the ten best sports movies of all time!" (Sports Illustrated, ESPN.com, The Sporting News). Lindon Sean (Stephen Baldwin) is the captain and coach of the Charleston Chiefs suffered. With a list of stars of the past and potential talents and the comically uncontrollable Hanson Brothers, the Charlestown Chiefs are a team whose glory days are but a distant memory. But the new millionaire sponsor team (Gary Busey, nominated for an Oscar) has a new strategy: turn the Chiefs defeated on an artificial hockey team fully programmed for television! And to make the situation even more painful, the new coach ... is a woman! Now, only a miracle, along with the bold strokes of Sean and the Hanson brothers, will show the world that the team has the talent to regain the passion for the game!
